---
title: 'EBImage:  Oriented Contours'
author: "Earl F Glynn"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(EBImage)
```

Computes the oriented contour of objects.

```{r}
x <- readImage(system.file("images", "shapes.png", package="EBImage"))
x <- x[1:120,50:120]
display(x)

oc = ocontour(x)
plot(oc[[1]], type='l')
points(oc[[1]], col=2)
```
